fullDescription.text: Apache Tomcat 10.1.39 has the following vulnerabilities: [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-8608, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-3615(CVE-2025-31650), [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-6846, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-5234, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-5233, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-8609, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-3616(CVE-2025-31651), [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-5235, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-6848, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-4728

help.markdown:
## Upgrade Guidance


### Upgrade Guidance for Direct dependency

| **Affected Direct Dependency**  | **Recommended short term version** | **Recommended long term version** |
| :--- |:--- | :--- |
| spring-boot-starter-web 3.4.4  | 3.5.6  | 3.5.6 |

### Upgrade Guidance for Transitive dependency

| **Affected Transitive Dependency**  | **Recommended short term version** | **Recommended long term version** |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Apache Tomcat 10.1.39  | 10.1.46  | 11.0.11 |



https://saastest.app.blackduck.com//api/projects/2cb10901-2899-4ccc-8011-8e6c64483e15/versions/ee411d3a-ac75-42fe-a17a-5455fafbc786/components?filter=bomInclusion%3Afalse&filter=bomMatchInclusion%3Afalse&filter=bomMatchReviewStatus%3Areviewed&filter=securityRisk%3Acritical&filter=securityRisk%3Ahigh&filter=securityRisk%3Amedium&filter=securityRisk%3Alow&limit=100&offset=0


## Modules Included

This alert covers the following related modules:
- tomcat-embed-core
- tomcat-embed-websocket
- tomcat-embed-el
